@graph.name: Meighan Brodkey
@graph.description: Salesforce MVP, Slack pusher, learning fanatic, detail obsessed, WIT User Group leader, Technical Architect, ❤️ challenges. Former Girl Scout, current rockstar.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Diigo
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Diigo is the app to research, study for certs and prepare your projects, a must have extension. Plus you can annotate the internet, make stickies on pages for later and go back later - how cool is that?

jetpack-related-posts.title: CMS Project
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Want information on Salesforce CMS? This is your spot for my CMS presentations, posts and pages all in one place!

jetpack-related-posts.title: AwesomeAdmin
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Post about being an #AwesomeAdmin and best practices & hacks to help you crush roadblocks.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Force Academy LA, 18
